Generation IX.Scarlet: It protects itself from enemies by emitting oil from the fruit on its head. This oil is bitter and astringent enough to make someone flinch.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon converts nutrients into oil, which it stores in the fruit on its head. It can easily go a whole week without eating or drinking.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
